title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.3 - Penalty for neglect or refusal by Sandy Hook pilot to join pilot boat
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.3 - Penalty for neglect or refusal by Sandy Hook pilot to join pilot boat

State Regulations

Any Sandy Hook pilot neglecting or refusing to join a pilot
boat forthwith after notice may have been given to him to join such boat, shall, unless satisfactory reasons are given for such neglect or refusal, be
fined the sum of $100, or be suspended for such time as the commissioners may
deem proper; or, if the refusal of the pilot to join a pilot boat shall be of
such nature as to warrant it, his license may be revoked. Notes

56.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
